text: I initially found out through a friend
and a fan who wrote us and said I just
want to alert you that someone's
spreading these links and what we found
out was some of those spreading links
all of our YouTube channels saying you
think Kristie chambers is a role model
she's actually a [ __ ] look at these
videos to find out that the videos
existed and to find out that this had
happened at all so it was just it's like
my world came crashing down I would say
to other victims who maybe don't have
the confidence and don't know what to do
about pursuing it that I know exactly
how you feel
I've been there I know there are many
days where I don't feel confident to
keep fighting and just knowing that
justice can be served you know I finally
learned yesterday that there was a light
at the end of my tunnel and I would just
want to say to people don't give up hope
even if it takes years you can get
justice and you didn't deserve to have
this happen to you
